SEARCH

Package net.dapete.locks

@NullMarked package net.dapete.locks

This package contains classes for key-based locking, as in a way to obtain Locks or ReadWriteLocks which are identified by a key. These locks are guaranteed to by different for each key and will be held as long as they are referenced.

The possible ways to obtain these are:

  • Locks.reentrant()
  • Locks.reentrant(Class)
  • Locks.withSupplier(Supplier)
  • ReadWriteLocks.reentrant()
  • ReadWriteLocks.reentrant(Class)
  • ReadWriteLocks.withSupplier(Supplier)

All implementations use generics for the type of the key as well as the type of lock, if this is not fixed (as with ReentrantLocks and ReentrantReadWriteLocks).

The parameter on the reentrant(Class) methods is the Class of the key type; this is a shortcut for readability, if the compiler cannot automatically detect it, e.g. var x = Locks.reentrant(String.class).

The withSupplier(Supplier) methods allow for any implementation of Lock or ReentrantLock to be used; just use the constructor as the Supplier, e.g. Locks.withSupplier(SuperEpicLock::new).

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Locks<K,L extends Lock>
    Key-based locking with implementations of Lock.
    ReadWriteLocks<K,L extends ReadWriteLock>
    Key-based locking with implementations of ReadWriteLock.
    ReentrantLocks<K>
     
    ReentrantReadWriteLocks<K>
